description: Final CNN model for B:Si(111) surface tip classification from PhD thesis. Uses identical architecture to Si(111)-7×7 model.

performance.notes: Higher precision than Si(111)-7×7 model, slightly lower accuracy

notes: Same architecture used for both Si(111)-7×7 and B:Si datasets
Final weights selected based on highest precision during training
18 total layers: 5 conv-pool blocks, 1 flatten, 3 dense-dropout, 1 output
Training done at room temperature on constant-current STM topography
Boron-doped silicon presents different surface features than Si(111)-7×7

thesis_reference.title: Automating Scanning Tunnelling Microscopy: A comparative Study of Machine Learning and Deterministic Methods
thesis_reference.author: Dylan S. Barker
